import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import './App.css' import Navbar from './components/Navbar/Navbar' import Landing from './components/landing/Landing' import Poster from './components/posters/Poster' import posterData from './components/posters/posterData' import axios from "./axios" import { useState } from 'react' import { API_KEY } from './constants/Constants' // import {API_KEY} from "./constants/Constants" function App() { const[trendingMovies, setTrendingMoviesData] = useState() console.log(trendingMovies ? trendingMovies : "","trending movies") const PosterItems = posterData.map((item) => ) const trendingMoviesData = trendingMovies.map((item,index) => ) useEffect(() => { axios.get( `https://api.themoviedb.org/3/trending/all/day?api_key=${API_KEY}` ).then((res) =>{setTrendingMoviesData(res.data)}) }, []) return (

Movies

{PosterItems}
{/* trending movies */}

Movies

{trendingMoviesData}
); } export default App
